o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_Check_JoinConditionSpecified
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Comment: This check checks if a join condtion has been specified to a source object with a join type
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:HelpMessage: This check ensures that if a join condtion has been specified to a source object with a join type
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:OutputMessage: The following objects do not pass custom check:
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:CheckScript:
Function %Check%(obj) %Check% = True ' Get the join type of the entity in current source object. Dim JoinType : JoinType = obj.GetExtendedAttributeText("mdde_JoinType") ' Get the join conditions of the source object. Dim objJoinConditions : Set objJoinConditions = obj.GetExtendedCollection("mdde_JoinConditions", False)
' For FROM join types we expect an empty list of join conditions. If (UCase(JoinType) = "FROM") Then If Not(objJoinConditions Is Nothing) Then If objJoinConditions.Count > 0 Then WriteError("Join conditions are specified for the FROM source object '" & obj.DisplayName & "', there should be none.") %Check% = False End If End If
' For all non-FROM join types we check the contents. Else 'Make sure join codition is specified Dim objMapping : Set objMapping = obj.ParentObject Dim objEntity : Set objEntity = objMapping.Classifier
' Check whether the collection exists, if not or when it is empty print an error. If objJoinConditions Is Nothing Then WriteError( "No join conditions specified for source object '" & obj.DisplayName & "' in the mapping '" & objMapping.DisplayName & "' for entity '" & objEntity.DisplayName & "'") %Check% = False ElseIf objJoinConditions.Count = 0 Then WriteError( "No join conditions specified for source object '" & obj.DisplayName & "' in the mapping '" & objMapping.DisplayName & "' for entity '" & objEntity.DisplayName & "'") %Check% = False
' If the collection exists and contains records, check the entries. Else ' Check join condition completeness Dim JoinCondition For Each JoinCondition In objJoinConditions
Dim objChildAttribute : Set objChildAttribute = JoinCondition.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_ChildAttribute") If (objChildAttribute is Nothing) Then WriteError( "The Child Attribute of the join condition is missing for the source object '" & obj.DisplayName & "' in the mapping '" & objMapping.DisplayName & "' for entity '" & objEntity.DisplayName & "'") %Check% = False End If
Dim strJoinOperator : strJoinOperator = JoinCondition.GetExtendedAttributeText("mdde_JoinOperator") If (Len(strJoinOperator) = 0) Then WriteError( "The Join Operator of the join condition is missing for the source object '" & obj.DisplayName & "' in the mapping '" & objMapping.DisplayName & "' for entity '" & objEntity.DisplayName & "'") %Check% = False End If
' Check if parent attribute is a literal value if False and Parent Attribute is empty the error message below will be executed Dim parentIsLiteralValue : parentIsLiteralValue = JoinCondition.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_ParentIsLiteralValue") Dim objParentAttribute : Set objParentAttribute = JoinCondition.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_ParentAttribute")
If (parentIsLiteralValue = False) and (objParentAttribute is Nothing) Then WriteError( "The Parent Attribute of the join condition is missing for the source object '" & obj.DisplayName & "' in the mapping '" & objMapping.DisplayName & "' for entity '" & objEntity.DisplayName & "'") %Check% = False End If Next End If End If End Function
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:AutoFixScrpt:
Function %Fix%(obj, outmsg) ' Implement your automatic correction on <obj> here ' filling <outmsg> as you wish ' and return True if successful.
outmsg = "Automatic correction not implemented"
%Fix% = False End Function
